QuestData.Title: Jin'Zil's Blessing
QuestData.Description: Ah, it is done! Now to test it out.$B$BTravel to the main point of conflict within Greatwood Vale and use my voodoo stick on the Krom'gar marauders battling the Grimtotem. My voodoo magic should renew their vigor and allow them to crush our enemies!$B$BGo now, $n!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Jin'Zil's Voodoo Stick to infuse 12 Krom'gar Marauders with Voodoo.
